core: Applied machine learning to improve production yield and optimize decision-making processes for critical manufacturing systems

technical_ic.medium: Developed ML pipeline from scratch to boost manufacturing yield
technical_ic.detailed: Architected end-to-end ML system for manufacturing optimization, implementing data pipeline for high-dimensional inputs and automated retraining capabilities

technical_lead.medium: Led root cause investigation using ML, building team capabilities in data analysis

research.medium: Created new ML methodology for performance prediction in manufacturing
research.detailed: Pioneered ML-driven approach to manufacturing optimization, combining physics-based modeling with data-driven insights

business_development.medium: Deployed ML system that maintained critical production timeline
business_development.detailed: Implemented ML solution that preserved $10M+ program timeline while reducing operational costs through automated analysis

innovation_lead.medium: Led transition to ML-driven decision making in production
innovation_lead.detailed: Spearheaded adoption of ML methodologies in manufacturing, establishing new paradigm for process optimization

subject_matter_expert.medium: Guided implementation of ML systems across production

technical_details.detail: Multiple ML algorithms evaluated and optimized
